channel.title: CVE Feed for Tips and Tricks HQ, Peter Petreski -- Simple Photo Gallery
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Tips and Tricks HQ, Peter Petreski -- Simple Photo Gallery

item.title: CVE-2022-47588|2024-09-05T15:25:40.681Z -- tips%20and%20tricks%20hq%2C%20peter%20petreski -- simple%20photo%20gallery
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Tips and Tricks HQ, Peter Petreski Simple Photo Gallery simple-photo-gallery allows SQL Injection.This issue affects Simple Photo Gallery: from n/a through v1.8.1.
